project.description: Project currently under configuration, then disabled till config completed and working fine as expected

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: product_set_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
The Product Set version of vENM to upgrade to
Example: 18.02.19

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cluster_id
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Deployment name of cENM Cloud Deployment to be upgraded

jp.ikedam.jenkins.plugins.extensible__ch.name: mt_utils_version
jp.ikedam.jenkins.plugins.extensible__ch.description:
This is the version of the scripts available in Nexus
The version used will be printed in the console output
Nexus Link

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: tafVersion
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Version of the TAF to use
AUTO will get the version mapped to Product Set
If you do not want to use mapped version, select a specific version to use

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: centralCSVVersion
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Version of the Central CSV to use
AUTO will get the version mapped to Product Set
If you do not want to use mapped version, then can select a specific version to use

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: tafSchedulerVersion
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Version of the TAF Scheduler to use
AUTO will get the version mapped to Product Set
If you do not want to use mapped version, then can select a specific version to use

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: send_confidence_level
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: This parameter is used to send the confidence level to portal/radiator/auto build log

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: conf_level_for_this_job
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The confidence level event to be sent to the portal/radiator/build log

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: _Testware_Items
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue:
<item-group parallel="false"> <item timeout-in-seconds="600"> <name>SingleSignOn REST - The16thFloor</name> <component>com.ericsson.oss.itpf.security.sso:ERICTAFsinglesignon-testware_CXP9031665</component> <suites>SsoRestSuite_basic.xml</suites> </item>
<item timeout-in-seconds="2400"> <name>Login Page - Curiosity</name> <component>com.ericsson.oss.clientcommon.login:ERICTAFlogin_CXP9031513</component> <suites>LoginPage.xml</suites> </item>
<item timeout-in-seconds="2400"> <name>SingleSignOn - The16thFloor</name> <component>com.ericsson.oss.itpf.security.sso:ERICTAFsinglesignon-testware_CXP9031665</component> <suites>SingleSignOn.xml</suites> </item> </item-group>

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "Retrieving Scripts from Nexus" tarFileName="utils_${mt_utils_version}.tar.gz" echo "Downloading file - ${tarFileName} - to the workspace" #curl -s --noproxy \* -L "https://arm101-eiffel004.lmera.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/service/local/artifact/maven/redirect?r=releases&g=com.ericsson.mtg&a=utils&p=tar.gz&v=${mt_utils_version}" -o ${tarFileName} curl -s --noproxy \* -L "https://arm1s11-eiffel004.eiffel.gic.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/service/local/artifact/maven/redirect?r=releases&g=com.ericsson.mtg&a=utils&p=tar.gz&v=${mt_utils_version}" -o ${tarFileName} tar -zxf ${tarFileName}
echo " ==============================================================================================" echo " ==============================================================================================" echo " ++++++++++++++++ catting ++++++++++++++++++++ " cat ${WORKSPACE}/parameters.properties echo " ==============================================================================================" echo " =============================================================================================="
echo " ============================ run RFA 250 setup script from MT ================================"
echo " ==============================================================================================" sh MTELoopScripts/pipeline_scripts/rfa_250_setup.sh ${WORKSPACE}/parameters.properties
echo " ============================ run trivial copy TAF properties ================================"
echo " ==============================================================================================" echo " =============================================================================================="
cat > taf.properties << EOL taf.profiles=RFA250 host.UiTestGrid.user.root.pass=shroot taf_ui.default_OS=LINUX host.UiTestGrid.port.ssh=22 # 1 Edit CENM URL ENMUrl=${cluster_id}.athtem.eei.ericsson.se # Edit the Cluster Name taf.config.dit.deployment.name=${cluster_id}
groups=RFA250,KGB,RFA # 2 Edit CENM URL #host.haproxy_0.instance=${cluster_id}.athtem.eei.ericsson.se #host.haproxy_0.ip=${cluster_id}.athtem.eei.ericsson.se #host.haproxy_0.port.https=443 #host.haproxy_0.port.http=80
#host.httpd_su0.instance=${cluster_id}.athtem.eei.ericsson.se #host.httpd_su0.ip=${cluster_id}.athtem.eei.ericsson.se #host.httpd_su0.port.https=443 #host.httpd_su0.port.http=80
#MT_CSV_FILE_URI=https://arm101-eiffel004.lmera.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/repositories/snapshots/com/ericsson/oss/testware/maintrack/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource-testware/20.16.12-SNAPSHOT/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource-testware-20.16.12-20201029.120017-8.csv #MT_CSV_FILE_URI=https://arm1s11-eiffel004.eiffel.gic.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/repositories/snapshots/com/ericsson/oss/testware/maintrack/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource-testware/20.16.12-SNAPSHOT/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource-testware-20.16.12-20201029.120017-8.csv #MT_CSV_FILE_URI=https://arm1s11-eiffel004.eiffel.gic.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/sites/tor/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource/21.03.5/maintrack/csv/nodeToAdd_2K.csv #MT_CSV_FILE_URI=https://ci-portal.seli.wh.rnd.internal.ericsson.com/static/tmpUploadSnapshot//2021-01-28_19-42-13/nodeToAdd_2K.csv
MT_CSV_FILE_URI=https://arm1s11-eiffel004.eiffel.gic.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/sites/tor/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource/21.12.18/maintrack/csv/nodeToAdd_2K.csv #MT_CSV_FILE_URI=https://arm1s11-eiffel004.eiffel.gic.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/sites/tor/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource/21.12.3/maintrack/csv/nodeToAdd_15K.csv
taf_ui.default_browser=FIREFOX taf.scenario.debug.enabled=true host.UiTestGrid.ip=141.137.235.136 host.UiTestGrid.user.root.type=ADMIN host.UiTestGrid.type=SELENIUM_GRID host.UiTestGrid.port.http=4444 # 3 Edit DMT ID dmt_id=793 EOL
cat taf.properties
#echo "MT_CSV_FILE_URI=https://arm101-eiffel004.lmera.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/repositories/snapshots/com/ericsson/oss/testware/maintrack/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource-testware/20.16.12-SNAPSHOT/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource-testware-20.16.12-20201029.120017-8.csv" >> "${WORKSPACE}/MTELoopScripts/libraries/rfa_250/taf.properties" #echo "MT_CSV_FILE_URI=https://arm1s11-eiffel004.eiffel.gic.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/repositories/snapshots/com/ericsson/oss/testware/maintrack/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource-testware/20.16.12-SNAPSHOT/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource-testware-20.16.12-20201029.120017-8.csv" >> "${WORKSPACE}/MTELoopScripts/libraries/rfa_250/taf.properties" #echo "MT_CSV_FILE_URI=https://arm1s11-eiffel004.eiffel.gic.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/sites/tor/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource/21.03.5/maintrack/csv/nodeToAdd_2K.csv" >> "${WORKSPACE}/MTELoopScripts/libraries/rfa_250/taf.properties" #echo "MT_CSV_FILE_URI=https://ci-portal.seli.wh.rnd.internal.ericsson.com/static/tmpUploadSnapshot//2021-01-28_19-42-13/nodeToAdd_2K.csv" >> "${WORKSPACE}/MTELoopScripts/libraries/rfa_250/taf.properties" #echo "MT_CSV_FILE_URI=https://arm1s11-eiffel004.eiffel.gic.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/sites/tor/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource/21.03.5/maintrack/csv/nodeToAdd_15K.csv" echo "MT_CSV_FILE_URI=https://arm1s11-eiffel004.eiffel.gic.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/sites/tor/enm-maintrack-central-test-datasource/21.12.18/maintrack/csv/nodeToAdd_2K.csv" >> "${WORKSPACE}/MTELoopScripts/libraries/rfa_250/taf.properties"

#!/bin/bash #This script is to find the accesible seleniumGrid IP of respective teams
version=$(curl --silent 'https://arm901-eiffel004.athtem.eei.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/repositories/nss/com/ericsson/nss/StandAlone_Simulation/uiTestGrid_healthcheck/maven-metadata.xml' | sed -n 's|<release>\(.*\)</release>|\1|p' | sed -e 's/^[ \t]*//' | tail -1)
echo "Downloading latest version $version of UI grid health check script "
curl --retry 5 -fsS "https://arm901-eiffel004.athtem.eei.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/repositories/nss/com/ericsson/nss/StandAlone_Simulation/uiTestGrid_healthcheck/$version/uiTestGrid_healthcheck-$version.sh" -o uiTestGrid_healthcheck.sh
curl --retry 5 -fsS "https://arm901-eiffel004.athtem.eei.ericsson.se:8443/nexus/content/repositories/simnet/com/ericsson/simnet/uiTestGrid_healthcheck.sh" -o uiTestGrid_healthcheck.sh
WORKSPACE=$WORKSPACE echo "====================== SKYPPING GRID CHECKS =================="
sh uiTestGrid_healthcheck.sh ${WORKSPACE}
echo " ================================ hopefully run TAF ========================================"
echo " ==============================================================================================" echo " =============================================================================================="

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
Run on Dep: ${ENV,var="clusterId"} (${ENV,var="Deployment"})
Run on
BUILD_STATUS:
$BUILD_STATUS
RUN BY:
${BUILD_USER}
BUILD LOG:
${BUILD_LOG, maxLines=20}
==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**==**
ALLURE_LINK
${TE_ALLURE_LOG_URL}
DEFAULT MESSAGE
$DEFAULT_CONTENT
